channel.title: IT on Imageless Thought
channel.description: Recent content in IT on Imageless Thought

item.title: CVAD Tour: CIO Visit
item.description: This is the combined materials for the IT Reorganization Assessment our institution is conducting. It includes the information that the Deloitte consulting group requested and has been updated to include the information to be provided during our tour with the campus CIO and system CTO.
